Entries.DialogueText: Never stop striving to achieve perfection.
Settle for nothing less than excellence in everything you do.
That was a very auspicious wedding ceremony, .
...What? You didn't see me there?
Hahaha... Kid... You can't keep a secret from Mr. Qi.
Keep it up, kid. I think you're gonna be a star.
Just ask me if you need anything.
Set your eyes on the furthest star, and let that be your goal.
It's always within your power to go one step further than you used to believe.
There's more to this world than meets the eye, kid. Some day, you might understand.
For now, just keep striving for excellence in everything you do.
Some things transcend time and space, kid. It's a unique feeling in the heart... a whisper of things beyond.
On the left, you'll find a board with my special challenges... custom-tailored for you, kid.
On the right, a set of fantastic prizes for those who meet my challenge...
Good luck, kid.
Wherever you go... I'm always behind the curtain, making sure the show is interesting. Hahaha...
Or... am I?
I got to where I am through the force of pure willpower, kid.
You see... The mind is a very powerful tool.
In fact, it's the most powerful tool in all of reality... and beyond.
I'm impressed with your tenacity, kid... it took a lot of walnuts to get this far.
Stop by whenever you wanna relax.
Keep working hard and maybe you'll end up like me someday.
Hey. Don't tell anyone about this place, okay? I want to keep it... exclusive.
You'd keep a secret for your friend Mr. Qi, wouldn't you?
I knew you'd end up here someday. Of course, I had to make it a little difficult so you'd have an incentive to achieve excellence.
I was born an ordinary boy, but I made a decision early in life that I would become extraordinary.
